participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: cheerful and adventurous, she enjoys outdoor activities and has a positive outlook on life.
participant_1.background: my favorite color is orange. i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago. i turned 18 years old yesterday. i like to go hiking in the mornings to see the sunset. i have a pet fish.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: outgoing and enthusiastic, he loves challenges and spending time in nature.
participant_2.background: i like to go hiking in the spring. my favorite activity is rock climbing. i've a black lab named trooper. i live in colorado. i'm a mechanical engineer.
